content.description:
Zero or more groups each consisting of one or more <dt> elements followed by one or more <dd> elements, optionally intermixed with <script> and <template> elements.
    Or (in WHATWG HTML): One or more <div> elements, optionally intermixed with <script> and <template> elements.

omission.description: None, both the starting and ending tag are mandatory.

parents.description: Any element that accepts flow content.
